84  public function getRoutesDataTable($routes, $dtName = "dtRoutes") {
85  $errors = [ ];
86  $messages = "";
87  foreach ( $routes as $route ) {
88  $errors = \array_merge ( $errors, $route->getMessages () );
89  }
90  if (\sizeof ( $errors ) > 0) {
91  $messages = $this->controller->showSimpleMessage ( $errors, "error", "Error", "warning" );
92  }
93  $dt = $this->jquery->semantic ()->dataTable ( $dtName, "Ubiquity\controllers\admin\popo\Route", $routes );
94  $dt->setIdentifierFunction ( function ($i, $instance) {
95  return $instance->getId ();
96  } );
97  $dt->setFields ( [ "path","methods","controller","action","cache","expired","name" ] );
98  $dt->setCaptions ( [ "Path","Methods","Controller","Action & parameters","Cache","Expired","Name","" ] );
99  $dt->fieldAsLabel ( "path", "car" );
100  $dt->setValueFunction ( "controller", function ($v) {
101  if (! is_string ( $v )) {
102  $lbl = new HtmlLabel ( "", "<span style='font-weight: bold;color: #3B83C0;'>call</span>::<span style='color: #7F0055;'>" . gettype ( $v ) . "</span>", "heartbeat" );
103  } else {
104  $lbl = new HtmlLabel ( "", "<span style='font-weight: bold;color: #3B83C0;'>" . $v . "</span>::<span style='color: #7F0055;'>class</span>", "heartbeat" );
105  }
106  $lbl->addClass ( "basic large" );
107  return $lbl;
108  } );
109  $this->_dtCache ( $dt );
110  $this->_dtMethods ( $dt );
111  $this->_dtAction ( $dt );
112  $this->_dtExpired ( $dt );
113  $dt->setGroupByFields ( [ 2 ] );
114  $dt->onRowClick ( 'if(!$(this).is("[data-group]"))$("#filter-routes").val($(this).find(".ui.label").text());' );
115  $dt->onPreCompile ( function ($dTable) {
116  $dTable->getHtmlComponent ()->colRightFromRight ( 0 );
117  $dTable->getHtmlComponent ()->colCenterFromRight ( 2 );
118  } );
119  $this->addGetPostButtons ( $dt );
120  $dt->setActiveRowSelector ( "warning" );
121  $dt->wrap ( $messages );
122  $dt->setEdition ()->addClass ( "compact" );
123  return $dt;
124  }

126  public function getControllersDataTable($controllers) {
127  $filteredCtrls = USession::init ( "filtered-controllers", UArray::remove ( ControllerAction::$controllers, "controllers\Admin" ) );
128  $controllers = array_filter ( $controllers, function ($item) use ($filteredCtrls) {
129  return array_search ( $item->getController (), $filteredCtrls ) !== false;
130  } );
131  $dt = $this->jquery->semantic ()->dataTable ( "dtControllers", "Ubiquity\controllers\admin\popo\ControllerAction", $controllers );
132  $dt->setFields ( [ "controller","action","dValues" ] );
133  $dt->setIdentifierFunction ( function ($i, $instance) {
134  return \urlencode ( $instance->getController () );
135  } );
136  $dt->setCaptions ( [ "Controller","Action [routes]","Default values","" ] );
137  $this->addGetPostButtons ( $dt );
138  $dt->setValueFunction ( "controller", function ($v, $instance, $index) {
139  $bts = new HtmlButtonGroups ( "bt-" . \urlencode ( $v ), [ $v ] );
140  $bts->addClass ( "basic" );
141  $bt = $bts->getItem ( 0 );
142  $bt->addClass ( "_clickFirst" )->setIdentifier ( "bt-0-" . $v );
143  $bt->addIcon ( "heartbeat", true, true );
144  $bt->setToggle ();
145  $dd = $bts->addDropdown ( [ "Add new action in <b>{$v}</b>..." ] );
146  $dd->setIcon ( "plus" );
147  $item = $dd->getItem ( 0 );
148  $item->addClass ( "_add-new-action" )->setProperty ( "data-controller", $instance->getController () );
149  $bt->onClick ( "$(\"tr[data-ajax='" . \urlencode ( $instance->getController () ) . "'] td:not([rowspan])\").toggle(!$(this).hasClass('active'));" );
150  return $bts;
151  } );
152  $dt->setValueFunction ( "action", function ($v, $instance, $index) {
153  $action = $v;
154  $controller = ClassUtils::getClassSimpleName ( $instance->getController () );
155  $r = new \ReflectionMethod ( $instance->getController (), $action );
156  $lines = file ( $r->getFileName () );
157  $params = $instance->getParameters ();
158  \array_walk ( $params, function (&$item) {
159  $item = $item->name;
160  } );
161  $params = " (" . \implode ( " , ", $params ) . ")";
162  $v = new HtmlSemDoubleElement ( "", "span", "", "<b>" . $v . "</b>" );
163  $v->setProperty ( "style", "color: #3B83C0;" );
164  $v->addIcon ( "lightning" );
165  $v .= new HtmlSemDoubleElement ( "", "span", "", $params );
166  $annots = $instance->getAnnots ();
167  foreach ( $annots as $path => $annotDetail ) {
168  $lbl = new HtmlLabel ( "", $path, "car" );
169  $lbl->setProperty ( "data-ajax", \htmlspecialchars ( ($path) ) );
170  $lbl->addClass ( "_route" );
171  $v .= "&nbsp;" . $lbl;
172  }
173  $v = \array_merge ( [ $v,"<span class='_views-container'>" ], $this->getActionViews ( $instance->getController (), $controller, $action, $r, $lines ) );
174  $v [] = "</span>";
175  return $v;
176  } );
177  $dt->onPreCompile ( function ($dt) {
178  $dt->setColAlignment ( 3, TextAlignment::RIGHT );
179  $dt->getHtmlComponent ()->mergeIdentiqualValues ( 0 );
180  } );
181  $dt->setEdition ( true );
182  $dt->addClass ( "compact" );
183  return $dt;
184  }

186  public function getFilterControllers($controllers) {
187  $selecteds = USession::init ( "filtered-controllers", UArray::remove ( $controllers, "controllers\Admin" ) );
188  $list = $this->jquery->semantic ()->htmlList ( "lst-filter" );
189  $list->addCheckedList ( array_combine ( $controllers, $controllers ), "<i class='heartbeat icon'></i>&nbsp;Controllers", $selecteds, false, "filtered-controllers[]" );
190  return $list;
191  }

193  public function getActionViews($controllerFullname, $controller, $action, \ReflectionMethod $r, $lines) {
194  $result = [ ];
195  $loadedViews = UIntrospection::getLoadedViews ( $r, $lines );
196  foreach ( $loadedViews as $view ) {
197  if (\file_exists ( \ROOT . \DS . "views" . \DS . $view )) {
198  $lbl = new HtmlLabel ( "lbl-view-" . $controller . $action . $view, $view, "browser", "span" );
199  $lbl->addClass ( "violet" );
200  $lbl->addPopupHtml ( "<i class='icon info circle green'></i>&nbsp;<b>" . $view . "</b> is ok." );
201  } else {
202  $lbl = new HtmlLabel ( "lbl-view-" . $controller . $action . $view, $view, "warning", "span" );
203  $lbl->addClass ( "orange" );
204  $lbl->addPopupHtml ( "<i class='icon warning circle'></i>&nbsp;<b>" . $view . "</b> file is missing." );
205  }
206  $result [] = $lbl;
207  }
208  $viewname = $controller . "/" . $action . ".html";
209  if (! \file_exists ( \ROOT . \DS . "views" . \DS . $viewname )) {
210  $bt = new HtmlButton ( "", "Create view " . $viewname );
211  $bt->setProperty ( "data-action", $action );
212  $bt->setProperty ( "data-controller", $controller );
213  $bt->setProperty ( "data-controllerFullname", $controllerFullname );
214  $bt->addClass ( "_create-view visibleover basic violet mini" )->setProperty ( "style", "visibility: hidden;" )->addIcon ( "plus" );
215  $result [] = $bt;
216  } elseif (\array_search ( $viewname, $loadedViews ) === false) {
217  $lbl = new HtmlLabel ( "lbl-view-" . $controller . $action . $viewname, $viewname, "browser", "span" );
218  $lbl->addPopupHtml ( "<i class='icon warning circle'></i>&nbsp;<b>" . $viewname . "</b> exists but is never loaded in action <b>" . $action . "</b>." );
219  $result [] = $lbl;
220  }
221  return $result;
222  }

224  protected function addGetPostButtons(DataTable $dt) {
225  $dt->addFieldButtons ( [ "GET","POST" ], true, function (HtmlButtonGroups $bts, $instance, $index) {
226  $path = $instance->getPath ();
227  $path = \str_replace ( "(.*?)", "", $path );
228  $path = \str_replace ( "(index/)?", "", $path );
229  $bts->setIdentifier ( "bts-" . $instance->getId () . "-" . $index );
230  $bts->getItem ( 0 )->addClass ( "_get" )->setProperty ( "data-url", $path );
231  $bts->getItem ( 1 )->addClass ( "_post" )->setProperty ( "data-url", $path );
232  $item = $bts->addDropdown ( [ "Post with parameters..." ] )->getItem ( 0 );
233  $item->addClass ( "_postWithParams" )->setProperty ( "data-url", $path );
234  } );
235  }

237  public function getCacheDataTable($cacheFiles) {
238  $dt = $this->jquery->semantic ()->dataTable ( "dtCacheFiles", "Ubiquity\controllers\admin\popo\CacheFile", $cacheFiles );
239  $dt->setFields ( [ "type","name","timestamp","size" ] );
240  $dt->setCaptions ( [ "Type","Name","Timestamp","Size","" ] );
241  $dt->setValueFunction ( "type", function ($v, $instance, $index) {
242  $item = $this->jquery->semantic ()->htmlDropdown ( "dd-type-" . $v, $v );
243  $item->addItems ( [ "Delete all","(Re-)Init cache" ] );
244  $item->setPropertyValues ( "data-ajax", $v );
245  $item->getItem ( 0 )->addClass ( "_delete-all" );
246  if ($instance->getFile () === "")
247  $item->getItem ( 0 )->setDisabled ();
248  $item->getItem ( 1 )->addClass ( "_init" );
249  if ($instance->getType () !== "Models" && $instance->getType () !== "Controllers" && $instance->getType () !== "Contents")
250  $item->getItem ( 1 )->setDisabled ();
251  $item->asButton ()->addIcon ( "folder", true, true );
252  return $item;
253  } );
254  $dt->addDeleteButton ( true, [ ], function ($o, $instance) {
255  if ($instance->getFile () == "")
256  $o->setDisabled ();
257  $type = $instance->getType ();
258  $o->setProperty ( "data-type", $type );
259  $type = \strtolower ( $type );
260  if ($type == 'models' || $type == 'controllers') {
261  $o->setProperty ( "data-key", $instance->getName () );
262  } else {
263  $o->setProperty ( "data-key", $instance->getFile () );
264  }
265  } );
266  $dt->setIdentifierFunction ( "getFile" );
267  $dt->setValueFunction ( "timestamp", function ($v) {
268  if ($v !== "")
269  return date ( DATE_RFC2822, $v );
270  } );
271  $dt->setValueFunction ( "size", function ($v) {
272  if ($v !== "")
273  return self::formatBytes ( $v );
274  } );
275  $dt->setValueFunction ( "name", function ($name, $instance, $i) {
276  if ($name != null) {
277  $link = new HtmlLink ( "lnl-" . $i );
278  $link->setContent ( $name );
279  $link->addIcon ( "edit" );
280  $link->addClass ( "_lnk" );
281  $link->setProperty ( "data-type", $instance->getType () );
282  $link->setProperty ( "data-ajax", $instance->getFile () );
283  $link->setProperty ( "data-key", $instance->getName () );
284  return $link;
285  }
286  } );
287  $dt->onPreCompile ( function ($dt) {
288  $dt->getHtmlComponent ()->mergeIdentiqualValues ( 0 );
289  } );
290  $this->jquery->postOnClick ( "._lnk", $this->controller->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/_showFileContent", "{key:$(this).attr('data-key'),type:$(this).attr('data-type'),filename:$(this).attr('data-ajax')}", "#modal", [ "hasLoader" => false ] );
291  $this->jquery->postFormOnClick ( "._delete", $this->controller->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/deleteCacheFile", "frmCache", "#dtCacheFiles tbody", [ "jqueryDone" => "replaceWith","params" => "{type:$(this).attr('data-type'),toDelete:$(this).attr('data-key')}" ] );
292  $this->jquery->postFormOnClick ( "._delete-all", $this->controller->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/deleteAllCacheFiles", "frmCache", "#dtCacheFiles tbody", [ "jqueryDone" => "replaceWith","params" => "{type:$(this).attr('data-ajax')}" ] );
293  $this->jquery->postFormOnClick ( "._init", $this->controller->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/initCacheType", "frmCache", "#dtCacheFiles tbody", [ "jqueryDone" => "replaceWith","params" => "{type:$(this).attr('data-ajax')}" ] );
294  return $dt;
295  }

297  public function getModelsStructureDataTable($datas, $name = "dtStructure") {
298  $de = $this->jquery->semantic ()->dataElement ( $name, $datas );
299  $fields = \array_keys ( $datas );
300  $de->setFields ( $fields );
301  $de->setCaptions ( $fields );
302  foreach ( $fields as $key ) {
303  $de->setValueFunction ( $key, function ($value) {
304  if ($value instanceof \stdClass) {
305  $value = $this->parseArray ( $value );
306  } elseif (is_array ( $value )) {
307  $value = $this->parseInlineArray ( $value );
308  }
309  return $value;
310  } );
311  }
312  return $de;
313  }
314 
315  protected function parseArray($value) {
316  $values = ( array ) $value;
317  $de = new DataElement ( "", $value );
318  $fields = \array_keys ( $values );
319  $de->setFields ( $fields );
320  $de->setCaptions ( $fields );
321  foreach ( $fields as $key ) {
322  $de->setValueFunction ( $key, function ($value) {
323  if ($value instanceof \stdClass) {
324  $value = $this->parseInlineArray ( ( array ) $value );
325  } elseif (is_array ( $value )) {
326  $value = $this->parseInlineArray ( $value );
327  } else {
328  $value = var_export ( $value, true );
329  }
330  return new HtmlLabel ( "", $value );
331  } );
332  }
333  return $de;
334  }
335 
336  protected function parseInlineArray($value) {
337  $result = [ ];
338  foreach ( $value as $k => $v ) {
339  $prefix = "";
340  if (! is_int ( $k )) {
341  $prefix = $k . ": ";
342  }
343  if (is_array ( $v )) {
344  $v = $this->parseInlineArray ( $v );
345  } elseif ($v instanceof \stdClass) {
346  $v = $this->parseInlineArray ( ( array ) $v );
347  } else {
348  $v = var_export ( $v, true );
349  $v = '<span style="color: teal">' . $v . '</span>';
350  }
351  $result [] = '<b>' . $prefix . '</b>' . $v;
352  }
353  return '[' . implode ( ", ", $result ) . ']';
354  }
355 
356  public function getRestRoutesTab($datas) {
357  $tabs = $this->jquery->semantic ()->htmlTab ( "tabsRest" );
358 
359  foreach ( $datas as $controller => $restAttributes ) {
360  $doc = "";
361  $list = new HtmlList ( "attributes", [ [ "heartbeat","Controller",$controller ],[ "car","Route",$restAttributes ["restAttributes"] ["route"] ] ] );
362  $list->setHorizontal ();
363  if (\class_exists ( $controller )) {
364  $parser = DocParser::docClassParser ( $controller );
365  $desc = $parser->getDescriptionAsHtml ();
366  if (isset ( $desc )) {
367  $doc = new HtmlMessage ( "msg-doc-controller-" . $controller, $desc );
368  $doc->setIcon ( "help blue circle" )->setDismissable ()->addClass ( "transition hidden" );
369  }
370  }
371  $routes = Route::init ( $restAttributes ["routes"] );
372  $errors = [ ];
373  foreach ( $routes as $route ) {
374  $errors = \array_merge ( $errors, $route->getMessages () );
375  }
376  $resource = $restAttributes ["restAttributes"] ["resource"];
377  $title = $resource;
378  if ($resource == null) {
379  if (class_exists ( $controller )) {
380  $title = call_user_func ( [ $controller,'_getApiVersion' ] );
381  }
382  }
383  $tab = $tabs->addTab ( $title, [ $doc,$list,$this->_getRestRoutesDataTable ( $routes, "dtRest", $resource, $restAttributes ["restAttributes"] ["authorizations"] ) ] );
384  if (\sizeof ( $errors ) > 0) {
385  $tab->menuTab->addLabel ( "error" )->setColor ( "red" )->addIcon ( "warning sign" );
386  $tab->addContent ( $this->controller->showSimpleMessage ( \array_values ( $errors ), "error", null, "warning" ), true );
387  }
388  if ($doc !== "") {
389  $tab->menuTab->addIcon ( "help circle blue" )->onClick ( "$('#" . $doc->getIdentifier () . "').transition('horizontal flip');" );
390  }
391  }
392  return $tabs;
393  }
394 
395  protected function _getRestRoutesDataTable($routes, $dtName, $resource, $authorizations) {
396  $dt = $this->jquery->semantic ()->dataTable ( $dtName, "Ubiquity\controllers\admin\popo\Route", $routes );
397  $dt->setIdentifierFunction ( function ($i, $instance) {
398  return $instance->getPath ();
399  } );
400  $dt->setFields ( [ "path","methods","action","cache","expired" ] );
401  $dt->setCaptions ( [ "Path","Methods","Action & Parameters","Cache","Exp?","" ] );
402  $dt->fieldAsLabel ( "path", "car" );
403  $this->_dtCache ( $dt );
404  $this->_dtMethods ( $dt );
405  $dt->setValueFunction ( "action", function ($v, $instance) use ($authorizations) {
406  $auth = "";
407  if (\array_search ( $v, $authorizations ) !== false) {
408  $auth = new HtmlIcon ( "lock-" . $instance->getController () . $v, "lock alternate" );
409  $auth->addPopup ( "Authorization", "This route require a valid access token" );
410  }
411  $result = [
412  "<span style=\"color: #3B83C0;\">" . $v . "</span>" . $instance->getCompiledParams () . "<i class='ui icon help circle blue hidden transition _showMsgHelp' id='" . JString::cleanIdentifier ( "help-" . $instance->getAction () . $instance->getController () ) . "' data-show='" . JString::cleanIdentifier ( "msg-help-" . $instance->getAction () . $instance->getController () ) . "'></i>",
413  $auth ];
414  return $result;
415  } );
416  $this->_dtExpired ( $dt );
417  $dt->addFieldButton ( "Test", true, function ($bt, $instance) use ($resource) {
418  $bt->addClass ( "toggle _toTest basic circular" )->setProperty ( "data-resource", ClassUtils::cleanClassname ( $resource ) );
419  $bt->setProperty ( "data-action", $instance->getAction () )->setProperty ( "data-controller", \urlencode ( $instance->getController () ) );
420  } );
421  $dt->onPreCompile ( function ($dTable) {
422  $dTable->setColAlignment ( 5, TextAlignment::RIGHT );
423  $dTable->setColAlignment ( 4, TextAlignment::CENTER );
424  } );
425  $dt->setEdition ()->addClass ( "compact" );
426  return $dt;
427  }
428 
429  protected function _dtMethods(DataTable $dt) {
430  $dt->setValueFunction ( "methods", function ($v) {
431  $result = "";
432  if (UString::isNotNull ( $v )) {
433  if (! \is_array ( $v )) {
434  $v = [ $v ];
435  }
436  $result = new HtmlLabelGroups ( "lbls-method", $v, [ "color" => "grey" ] );
437  }
438  return $result;
439  } );
440  }
441 
442  protected function _dtCache(DataTable $dt) {
443  $dt->setValueFunction ( "cache", function ($v, $instance) {
444  $ck = new HtmlFormCheckbox ( "ck-" . $instance->getPath (), $instance->getDuration () . "" );
445  $ck->setChecked ( UString::isBooleanTrue ( $v ) );
446  $ck->setDisabled ();
447  return $ck;
448  } );
449  }
450 
451  protected function _dtExpired(DataTable $dt) {
452  $dt->setValueFunction ( "expired", function ($v, $instance, $index) {
453  $icon = null;
454  $expired = null;
455  if ($instance->getCache ()) {
456  if (\sizeof ( $instance->getParameters () ) === 0 || $instance->getParameters () === null)
457  $expired = CacheManager::isExpired ( $instance->getPath (), $instance->getDuration () );
458  if ($expired === false) {
459  $icon = "hourglass full";
460  } elseif ($expired === true) {
461  $icon = "hourglass empty orange";
462  } else {
463  $icon = "help";
464  }
465  }
466  return new HtmlIcon ( "", $icon );
467  } );
468  }
469 
470  protected function _dtAction(DataTable $dt) {
471  $dt->setValueFunction ( "action", function ($v, $instance) {
472  $result = "<span style=\"font-weight: bold;color: #3B83C0;\">" . $v . "</span>";
473  $result .= $instance->getCompiledParams ();
474  if (! \method_exists ( $instance->getController (), $v )) {
475  $errorLbl = new HtmlIcon ( "error-" . $v, "warning sign red" );
476  $errorLbl->addPopup ( "", "Missing method!" );
477  return [ $result,$errorLbl ];
478  }
479  return $result;
480  } );
481  }
482 
483  public function getConfigDataElement($config) {
484  $de = $this->jquery->semantic ()->dataElement ( "deConfig", $config );
485  $fields = \array_keys ( $config );
486  $de->setFields ( $fields );
487  $de->setCaptions ( $fields );
488  $de->setValueFunction ( "database", function ($v, $instance, $index) {
489  $dbDe = new DataElement ( "", $v );
490  $dbDe->setFields ( [ "type","dbName","serverName","port","user","password","options","cache" ] );

540  private function getCaptionToggleButton($id, $caption, $active = "") {
541  $bt = (new HtmlButton ( $id, $caption ))->setToggle ( $active )->setTagName ( "a" );

546  private function labeledInput($input, $value) {
547  $lbl = "[empty]";
548  if (UString::isNotNull ( $value ))
549  $lbl = $value;
550  $input->getField ()->labeled ( $lbl );
551  return $input;
552  }
553 
554  private function _cleanStdClassValue($value) {
555  if ($value instanceof \stdClass) {
556  $value = ( array ) $value;
557  }
558  if (is_array ( $value )) {
559  $value = UArray::asPhpArray ( $value, "array" );
560  }
561  $value = str_replace ( '"', "'", $value );
562  return $value;
563  }

566  $de = $this->jquery->semantic ()->dataElement ( "frmDeConfig", $config );

767 
768  return $de->asForm ();

770 
771  private static function formatBytes($size, $precision = 2) {
772  $base = log ( $size, 1024 );
773  $suffixes = array ('o','Ko','Mo','Go','To' );
774  return round ( pow ( 1024, $base - floor ( $base ) ), $precision ) . ' ' . $suffixes [floor ( $base )];
775  }

782  $item->addIcon ( $e [1] . " bordered circular" )->setSize ( "big" );
783  $item->addItemHeaderContent ( $e [0], [ ], $e [2] );
784  $item->setProperty ( "data-ajax", $e [0] );
785  return $item;
786  } );
787  $items->getOnClick ( $this->controller->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute (), "#main-content", [ "attr" => "data-ajax","historize" => true ] );
788  return $items->addClass ( "divided relaxed link" );
789  }

801  public function getGitCommitsDataTable($commits) {
802  $notPushed = false;
803  $dt = $this->jquery->semantic ()->dataTable ( "dtCommits", "Ubiquity\utils\git\GitCommit", $commits );
804  foreach ( $commits as $commit ) {
805  if (! $commit->getPushed ()) {
806  $notPushed = true;
807  break;
808  }
809  }
810  $dt->setColor ( "green" );
811  $dt->setIdentifierFunction ( "getLHash" );
812  $dt->setFields ( [ "cHash","author","cDate","summary" ] );
813  $dt->setCaptions ( [ "Hash","Author","Date","Summary" ] );
814  $dt->setActiveRowSelector ();
815  $dt->onRowClick ( $this->jquery->getDeferred ( $this->controller->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/changesInCommit", "#changesInCommit-div", [ "attr" => "data-ajax" ] ) );
816  $dt->setValueFunction ( 0, function ($value, $instance) {
817  if ($instance->getPushed ()) {
818  return "<i class='ui green check square icon'></i>" . $value;
819  }
820  return "<i class='ui external square alternate icon'></i>" . $value;
821  } );
822  $dt->onNewRow ( function ($row, $object) {
823  if ($object->getPushed ())
824  $row->addClass ( "positive" );
825  } );
826  $this->jquery->exec ( '$("#htmlbuttongroups-push-pull-bts-0").prop("disabled",' . ($notPushed ? "false" : "true") . ');', true );
827  return $dt;
828  }

843  public function getLogsDataTable($maxLines = null, $reverse = true, $groupBy = [1,2], $contexts = null) {
844  $os = Logger::asObjects ( $reverse, $maxLines, $contexts );
845  $dt = $this->jquery->semantic ()->dataTable ( "dt-logs", LogMessage::class, $os );
846  $gbSize = 0;
847  if (is_array ( $groupBy )) {
848  $gbSize = sizeof ( $groupBy );
849  }
850  $dt->setFields ( [ "level","datetime","context","part","message","extra" ] );
851  $dt->setCaptions ( [ "Level","When?","Context","Part","Message","Extra" ] );
852  $dt->setValueFunction ( 1, function ($value, $instance) {
853  $lbl = new HtmlLabel ( uniqid ( "datetime-" ), UDateTime::elapsed ( $value ), "clock" );
854  $lbl->addPopup ( "", UDateTime::longDatetime ( $value, "fr" ) );
855  return $lbl;
856  } );
857  $dt->setValueFunction ( 0, function ($value, $instance) {
858  return new HtmlIcon ( "", HtmlLogFormatter::getIcon ( $instance ) );
859  } );
860  $dt->setValueFunction ( 3, function ($value, $instance) {
861  if (($count = $instance->getCount ()) > 1) {
862  $lbl = new HtmlLabel ( uniqid ( "count-" ), "x" . $count );
863  $lbl->addClass ( "circular" );
864  return $value . "&nbsp;" . $lbl;
865  } else {
866  return $value;
867  }
868  } );
869 
870  $dt->setValueFunction ( 5, function ($value, $instance) {
871  if (isset ( $value )) {
872  $lbl = new HtmlLabel ( uniqid ( "count-" ), sizeof ( $value ), "database" );
873  $lbl->addClass ( "circular" );
874  $lbls = new HtmlLabelGroups ( "", $value, [ "circular" ] );
875  $lbl->addPopupHtml ( "<h4>Datas</h4>" . $lbls, null, [ "on" => "click" ] );
876  return $lbl;
877  }
878  } );
879 
880  $dt->onNewRow ( function ($row, $instance) {
881  $row->addClass ( HtmlLogFormatter::getFormat ( $instance ) );
882  } );
883  $dt->setHasCheckboxes ( true );
884  $dt->onPreCompile ( function () use (&$dt, $gbSize) {
885  $body = $dt->getHtmlComponent ()->getBody ();
886  $body->addPropertyCol ( 6 - $gbSize, "style", "max-width: 300px;word-break:break-all;" );
887  $body->addPropertyCol ( 5 - $gbSize, "style", "max-width: 500px;word-break:break-all;" );
888  } );
889  if (is_array ( $groupBy )) {
890  $dt->setGroupByFields ( $groupBy );
891  }
892  $dt->setCompact ( true )->setSelectable ();
893  return $dt;
894  }
895 
896  public function displayViolations($instancesViolations) {
897  if (sizeof ( $instancesViolations ) == 0) {
898  echo $this->controller->showSimpleMessage ( "No violations!", "success", 'Instances validation', 'check' );
899  } else {
900  $nb = sizeof ( $instancesViolations );
901  echo $this->controller->showSimpleMessage ( $nb . " instance(s) with violations!", "warning", 'Instances validation', 'exclamation triangle' );
902  $dt = new DataTable ( "dtInstancesViolations", InstanceViolations::class, InstanceViolations::initFromArray ( $instancesViolations ) );
903  $dt->setFields ( [ 'instance','violations' ] );
904  $dt->fieldAsLabel ( 'instance' );
905  $dt->setValueFunction ( 'violations', function ($violations) {
906  $result = [ ];
907  $header = "";
908  foreach ( $violations as $violation ) {
909  $msg = new HtmlMessage ( "" );
910  $severity = $violation->getSeverity ();
911  $msg->addClass ( "tiny " . ConstraintViolationViewer::getType ( $severity ) );
912  $msg->addHeader ( $violation->getMember () );
913  $msg->setIcon ( ConstraintViolationViewer::getIcon ( $severity ) );
914  $message = str_replace ( $violation->getValue (), '<span style="color:teal">' . $violation->getValue () . '</span>', $violation->getMessage () );
915  $msg->addList ( [ '<b>' . ClassUtils::getClassSimpleName ( $violation->getValidatorType () ) . '</b> : ' . $message ] );
916  $result [] = $msg;
917  }
918  return $result;
919  } );
920  echo $dt;
921  /*
922  * foreach ($instancesViolations as $instanceViolations){
923  *
924  * }
925  */
926  }
927  }
928 }
